file_insights.changes: Added useEffect hook to focus first enabled menu item when dropdown opens
file_insights.impact: Improved keyboard accessibility for dropdown menus

patterns_discovered: Dynamic index-based focus management for menu items
Conditional focusing based on item availability
gotchas_discovered: Need to wait for menu items to register before focusing
Cleanup of animation frame to prevent memory leaks

approach_outcome.key_implementation: Added useEffect to find and focus first enabled menu item on dropdown open

recommendations: Consider adding aria attributes for screen reader support
Test with various keyboard navigation scenarios
